supply.supply_status: Adequate but constrained - Q3 1941 period after Operation Battleaxe (June) and before Operation Crusader (November). Supply lines from Tripoli stretched across 800km. Fuel reserves marginal at 5-6 days, ammunition adequate at 10 days, water critical desert constraint at 2.5L/man/day, food reserves 12 days. British blockade and limited Axis shipping affecting resupply.
